name: Class SynthTableUI
text:
Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for
 JTable.
codes:
public class SynthTableUI
extends BasicTableUI
implements SynthUI, PropertyChangeListener

methods.description: Creates a new UI object for the given component.

Initializes JTable properties, such as font, foreground, and background.
 The font, foreground, and background properties are only set if their
 current value is either null or a UIResource, other properties are set
 if the current value is null.

methods.method_sig:
public void update (Graphics g,
                   JComponent c)
methods.description:
Notifies this UI delegate to repaint the specified component.
 This method paints the component background, then calls
 the paint(SynthContext,Graphics) method.

 In general, this method does not need to be overridden by subclasses.
 All Look and Feel rendering code should reside in the paint method.

methods.method_sig:
public void paint (Graphics g,
                  JComponent c)
methods.description:
Paints the specified component according to the Look and Feel.
 This method is not used by Synth Look and Feel.
 Painting is handled by the paint(SynthContext,Graphics) method.

methods.method_sig:
protected void paint (SynthContext context,
                     Graphics g)
